meta.title: Home - Dare County Schools

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

li.a: Strategic Plan and School Improvement Plans
Strategic Plan and School Improvement Plans
Strategic Plan and School Improvement Plans

ul.li: About Dare Dare County Schools is located on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. Learn more about our community and what makes our county a great place to live, work and learn!
Our MissionDare County Schools is a progressive public school district with a focus on innovation and academic excellence. Learn more about our mission!
Our Curriculum FocusFrom the moment our students arrive on campus, they engage in captivating curriculum and rigorous instruction. Learn more here!
Spanish Immersion Dare County Schools is excited to offer parents of rising kindergarten and first-grade students the opportunity to enroll in a fully immersed Spanish classroom. Learn more here!
Enroll your Child Today!Come join the Dare family and experience the warmth of our community, the energy of our schools and the excitement of our location!
Looking for Someone? Our intuitive Faculty and Staff Directory make it easy to search our departments and find exactly who you are looking for.

Message from Chairman BasnightBoard of Education Chairman Bea Basnight expresses the board's support for the engaging and innovative initiatives that make Dare County Schools a leader in public education in North Carolina.

Meet the Board The Board of Education in Dare County Schools is comprised of seven board members. Our Board of Education is highly engaged and supportive of the work of teachers, students and parents.

li.a: Strategic Plan and School Improvement Plans

video.div: Your web browser does not support the <video> tag.

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsSlideshow post-update fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_3 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.p: Parents wishing to enroll their child in Kindergarten for the 2020-2021 school year can now access the online application. Learn more here!

article.a: Full Article about 2020-2021 Kindergarten Registration is Now Open!

div.p: Access up-to-the-minute updates on COVID-19 and our response to the growing concern.

img.alt: Spanish Dual Language Immersion in all Dare County Elementary Schools

div.a: Spanish Dual Language Immersion in all Dare County Elementary Schools

div.p: Dare County Schools partners with Participate Learning to help implement and support Spanish dual language immersion programs in all five elementary schools. Learn about the program here!

article.a: Full Article about Spanish Dual Language Immersion in all Dare County Elementary Schools

div.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow home-cal fsItemCount_4 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.p: Dare County Schools is excited to offer parents the option of enrolling their rising kindergarten and first-grade students in a Spanish Dual Language classroom.
Dare County Schools was ranked in the top 5 public school districts in North Carolina by a 2017 report from the Public School Forum.
Cape Hatteras Secondary School offers students an exciting opportunity to partner with a local Coastal Studies Institute to learn more about the rich ecosystems on the Outer Banks.
Students in Dare County Schools graduate at significantly higher rates than other districts in North Carolina.
All schools in Dare County meet or exceed growth each year. Manteo High School is one of the few schools in North Carolina to receive a school grade of A+.
Dare County Schools is one of the few public school districts in the nation to have a public education foundation.

p.a: earn how the foundation supports our students.

div.p: Our high schools are nationally recognized for high SAT scores and high college acceptance rates.
Teachers that work for Dare County Schools have the option of living in one of our teacher housing apartment complexes. This is just one of the many advantages of working in Dare County Schools!

Our MissionDare County Schools is a progressive public school district with a focus on innovation and academic excellence. Learn more about our mission!

Spanish Immersion Dare County Schools is excited to offer parents of rising kindergarten and first-grade students the opportunity to enroll in a fully immersed Spanish classroom. Learn more here!
Enroll your Child Today!Come join the Dare family and experience the warmth of our community, the energy of our schools and the excitement of our location!
Looking for Someone? Our intuitive Faculty and Staff Directory make it easy to search our departments and find exactly who you are looking for.

Strategic Plan and School Improvement Plans

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: On March 23, 2020, Governor Roy Cooper announced an Executive Order that closes all North Carolina Public Schools until May 15, 2020.
Dare County Schools has transitioned to online learning for all students during the closure. More information can be found on the following websites:

p.a: Remote Learning Information for Families and Students
